snippet.title: Fruit Ninja Origins - FRUIT FIGHT!
snippet.description:
A relaxing afternoon at the dojo turns into an all out fruit fight between Katsuro, Mari, Nobu and our newest Fruit Ninja, Han!

You've never seen a food fight like this!

Click to Subscribe: http://bit.ly/SubscribeFruitNinja




Fruit Ninja is available now for iPhone, iPad, Android and Windows Phone. Created by Halfbrick.
